1.text: Melt 3 tablespoons (45 grams) of butter in a large saucepan.

2.text: Add 1 package of marshmallows and cook them for 10-15 minutes.

3.text: Stir in 6 cups (150 grams) of Rice Krispies cereal.

4.text: Press the mixture into a greased pan and let it cool for 10-15 minutes.

5.text: Cut the Rice Krispies treats into 2 in (5.1 cm) squares.

6.text: Store the treats in an air-tight container at room temperature.

7.text: Melt butter and marshmallows in a large saucepan.

8.text: Add 1/4 cup (25 grams) of cocoa powder to the saucepan.

9.text: Stir in Rice Krispies cereal and some chocolate chips.

10.text: Transfer the mixture to a baking pan and sprinkle chocolate chips on top.

11.text: Let the mixture cool for 15 minutes before cutting it into squares.

12.text: Frost your Rice Krispies treats to give them a sweet, festive touch.

13.text: Dip your treats in melted chocolate or candy for a decadent dessert.

14.text: Turn your Rice Krispies treats into lollipops using wooden skewers.
